mapper.select: SELECT client_id, email, first_name, last_name, phone FROM clients
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO client (client_id, first_name, last_name, email, client_pwd, phone, reg_date) VALUES ( #{clientId}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{clientPwd}, #{phone}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT client_no, client_id, first_name, last_name, email, client_pwd, phone, reg_date, edit_date FROM client WHERE client_no = #{clientNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE client SET client_no = #{clientNo}, client_id = #{clientId}, first_name = #{firstName}, last_name = #{lastName}, email = #{email}, client_pwd = #{clientPwd}, phone = #{phone}, edit_date = NOW() WHERE client_no = #{clientNo}
